NewsArticle.Title: Dark Ages: Medenia Announced!
NewsArticle.Content: The Dark Ages Team has announced the addition of the biggest update to Dark Ages since the game was released -- Dark Ages: Medenia. Coming with this expansion is completely enhanced graphics, a new interface, and new in-game features, such as the Family Tree, town mapping, and much, much more! Keep an eye on us for more news and information. The excitement is just beginning! Dark Ages: Medenia
